i9a1('bum): hA/ gzugs ben pa'i bar byang chub maspyad par sngun gyi mthur mya gzugs pa
i9a2('bum): meng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sem sna dpa'i phyi ma'i mthor
i9a3('bum): so// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// gzugs dang na pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma
i9a4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs po nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub su dang pa phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// gzugs
i9a5('bum): sems dpa'angabus su myi dmyigs so/ gzugs stong po nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzu
i9b1('bum): ci'i phyir nam/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs pa
i9b2('bum): nyid myong ba la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs
i9b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs dben pa 'di gzhan mnas ning/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang
i9b4('bum): gzhan ma yin// ston gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
i9b5('bum): bu de ltar na/ gzugs myed pa'i pa gang yin pa dang // gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid
i9b6('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus pa
i10a1('bum): kyang gnyis su myong da gnyis su byar byed da/ tshad ldan pa
i10a2('bum): phyogs sa/ sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ skye dadan de'i phyir byang chub sem sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i10a3('bum): sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi myi dmyigs so// sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma
i10a4('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sgra dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs su/ sgra ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i
i10a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// sgra myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sgra steng pa
i10a6('bum): sa su myi dmyigs so// spa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems pa
i10b1('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs tesgra myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sgra steng pa nyid kyang gzhan mA ldan to/ sgra na pa 'di gzhan ma yin
i10b2('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhin ma
i10b3('bum): no tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sgra myed pa gang yin pa dang / sgra stong pa nyid gang sbyin pa dang // smre dben pa gang yin pa dang / sgra ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin
i10b4('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang // sngon kyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
i10b5('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i10b6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi ma
i10b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// dri myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so
i11a1('bum): ban pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mya dmyigs sa// phreng ba nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma 'i mthar ma dmyigs so
i11a2('bum): bsems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyigs so// dri myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dri dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so
i11a3('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri med pa'i dang / dri stong po nyid dang / dri dben pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid med pa
i11a4('bum): la sngon kyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus su myi dmyigs te/ dri med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dri dben pa 'ang gzhan
i11a5('bum): ring myed pa 'ong gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang ga
i11a6('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ dri med pa gang yin pa dang / dri stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dri dben pa gang yin pa dang / dri ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
i11a7('bum): nga gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myong de gnyis su byar myed do
i11a8('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu ro myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ro spong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ ro na pa'i phyi
i11b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ri ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dri myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma
i11b2('bum): myi dmyigs so// ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyigs so ke/ dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ri ngo bo nyid myed pa
i11b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ro mang pa'i phyir byang chub sems da pa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// ro stong po nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig
i11b4('bum): so// ro dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shar
i11b5('bum): dwa ti'i bu re myed pa dang / ro stong pa nyid dang // ro dben pa dang / ro ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthu' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ro myed pa 'ang gzhan ma
i11b6('bum): yin/ ro stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ro dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ro ngo bo nyid myed pa'i de gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
i11b7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ re myed pa gang yin pa dang / ro stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ro dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
i11b8('bum): ringo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi mo'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad gnyis su myed de
i12a1('bum): gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar myi dmyigs sa/ reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i12a2('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthor myi dmyigs so// reg ji ba nyid meng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rag
i12a3('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i12a4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg sto
i12a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i12a6('bum): su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg myed pa dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / reg dben pa dang / reg ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
i12a7('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ reg med pa'ang gzhan ma yin no/ reg stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// reg dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa ngo bo nyid myeng po'ang gzhan ma
i12a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ ston gyi mtha' 'ang gzhar na yin 'aM'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i12b1('bum): ye tshig myed pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang / reg stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rig dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg de bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / 
i12b2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos myed
i12b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i12b4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 
i12b5('bum): so// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos ngo bo nyid myeng po'i/ 
i12b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i12b7('bum): su myi dmyigs so// chos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir
i12b8('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos myed pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / chos dben pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon kyi tha mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
i13a1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos dben pa dang gzhan ma yin/ chos ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma
i13a2('bum): chub sems dpa'o 'o gzhan mu yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta
i13a3('bum): chos myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / 
i13a4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam
i13a5('bum): shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig
i13a6('bum): gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthor myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i13a7('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i13a8('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor mi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar gyi
i13b1('bum): dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyi
i13b2('bum): so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
i13b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'ang / myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes
i13b4('bum): pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa
i13b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin// myig gi rnam par shes pa gi ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan
i13b6('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
i13b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
i13b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
i14a1('bum): smad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ston kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa srung ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam
i14a2('bum): sa pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par
i14a3('bum): shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par
i14a4('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rna
i14a5('bum): par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par
i14a6('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen
i14a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pA shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i rnam por shes pa ngo bo nyid myong ba la snga
i14a8('bum): kyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin/ 
i14b1('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin te byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i14b2('bum): ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang rna rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin
i14b3('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa drang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang
i14b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i14b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i14b6('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i14b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig
i14b8('bum): se sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so
i15a1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyags saH/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs sa
i15a2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang
i15a3('bum): sde'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid drang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa 'a
i15a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
i15a5('bum): sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan mi yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sna'i rnam par
i15a6('bum): shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha'
i15a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis
i15a8('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi
i15b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyig so soH/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigaso/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir bya
i15b2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i15b3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i15b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' da
i15b5('bum): su myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes par ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig so/ 
i15b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed
i15b7('bum): ba la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma ma
i15b8('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
i16a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gran na ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ta'i bu de ltar na/ lha'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes
i16a2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha
i16a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i
i16a4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben
i16a5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes bu ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa med
i16a6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i
i16a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ 
i16a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i16b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi
i16b2('bum): shes pa myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la te byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so
i16b3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te su rnam par shes pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan gyi ma yin/ lus
i16b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin / sngon kyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
i16b5('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed da / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
i16b6('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / dbus byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa
i16b7('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par
i16b8('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam pa
i17a1('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid
i17a2('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par
i17a3('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa/ 
i17a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i17a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
i17a6('bum): pa dben pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi
i17a7('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzham
i17a8('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par
i17b1('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid ka rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid mang po gang yin pa dang / bya'o chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / ston
i17b2('bum): kyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i
i17b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ 
i17b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
i17b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
i17b6('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i17b7('bum): su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so
i17b8('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / 
i18a1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te dag pa dben pa dang / myig ga 'dus te reg pa shang mu pal sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma
i18a2('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gnon ma yin// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngom pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi'i'adus
i18a3('bum): te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe
i18a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myig gi 'dus te rig pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te re
i18a5('bum): po ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med
i18a6('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sos
i18a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mtharamyi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mther myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
i18a8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems pa
i18b1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i18b2('bum): sems dpa'i phyi ma DI'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs
i18b3('bum): dpa' dbus/ su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i18b4('bum): dbus su myi da/ myigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i
i18b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs / phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
i18b6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa 'dra gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te rog po ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
i18b7('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i
i18b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gsung nga yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / 
i19a1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myad de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i rdzu stsa
i19a2('bum): te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben
i19a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir
i19a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sa
i19a5('bum): raba'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i19a6('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyi
i19a7('bum): sesna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus
i19a8('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus
i19b1('bum): te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan mu
i19b2('bum): ma yinano/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin / phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzha na ma ya ni/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dri
i19b3('bum): de ltar na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
i19b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang / 
i19b5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi me thur mi dmyigasaso// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i19b6('bum): saM A lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ 
i19b7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i
i19b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus/ 
i20a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lha'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus
i20a2('bum): reg bya dben pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs sa / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ri 'i nyid myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dnga'o dbus su myi dmyigs su/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan
i20a3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma
i20a4('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i20a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
i20a6('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg dben pa gang yin pa
i20a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
i20a8('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpo' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
i20b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sprin kyi mthar mi dmyi gas so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo
i20b2('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong
i20b3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid me
i20b4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
i20b5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
i20b6('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben po dang / lus
i20b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
i20b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// lus kyi 'dus te reg po dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin no lus kyi 'dus te rig tu bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtham
i21a1('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa gang
i21a2('bum): yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
i21a3('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed de// tshe dang ldan
i21a4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha
i21a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i21a6('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa steng pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i21a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i21a8('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang sa
i21b1('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal dbus su mi ru myigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myeng ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i21b2('bum): su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus
i21b3('bum): reg pa dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa'ang gzhan
i21b4('bum): ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid de kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bya
i21b5('bum): chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu do
i21b6('bum): ni yid kyi 'dus te reg bya gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg ngo bo nyid med
i21b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthu gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su
i21b8('bum): byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rlon
i22a1('bum): kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' snyan gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyis
i22a2('bum): tshwa re ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthur myi dmyigs so/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
i22a3('bum): myig gi 'dus te rig po'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i22a4('bum): dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
i22a5('bum): ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myig
i22a6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dngos su myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis rlur byung ben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i22a7('bum): su mi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig
i22a8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / myig gi 'dus
i22b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'ang gzhan
i22b2('bum): ma yin// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshe rab stong popa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i22b3('bum): kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'dra gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
i22b4('bum): no/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus
i22b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin/ 
i22b6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed de/ 
i22b7('bum): tshe dang ljon pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi
i22b8('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus
i23a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngan gyi mthar mya dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus tute rag pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir bang
i23a2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
i23a3('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i23a4('bum): so/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir bya
i23a5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i23a6('bum): kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
i23a7('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus
i23a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshong ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te
i23b1('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna lung 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshur tu stong po nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i23b2('bum): tsher ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshe re ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan
i23b3('bum): mu yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
i23b4('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshur dben pa ga
i23b5('bum): yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' ga
i23b6('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i23b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
i23b8('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyig
i24a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i24a2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te rog po'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i24a3('bum): kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
i24a4('bum): so sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
i24a5('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
i24a6('bum): bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshur bo stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
i24a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myeng pa'ang gzhan
i24a8('bum): ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
i24b1('bum): kyis tshor ba spangapa nyid gang yA su dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor dben
i24b2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon kyi mtha'i 'ang gzhon ma yin/ phye mo'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
i24b3('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rkyen kyis 'dus te reg pa'i
i24b4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gas gis da / phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
i24b5('bum): thams cad gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i24b6('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher
i24b7('bum): bya dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i24b8('bum): so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te rego pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i24b9('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i25a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed
i25a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus
i25a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsherab ngo bo nyid myed po'i phyir byang chub sems
i25a4('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher po myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
i25a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myong ba yi skyon gyi mthu' myi dmyigs pa phyi ma'i mtha'
i25a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
i25a7('bum): yin mo lnga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid meng pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
i25b1('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
i25b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
i25b3('bum): tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
i25b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi mo'i mtha' gung yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do/ 
i25b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pashA ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mtha ro myi dmyigs so// lus kyi
i25b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshur ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur myo dmyigs so/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir
i25b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i25b8('bum): so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nor ba song pa
i26a1('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i26a2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lus
i26a3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsho ra ba myed pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
i26a4('bum): chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg
i26a5('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
i26a6('bum): myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsherab stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba
i26a7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma
i26a8('bum): yin lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'ing gzhan ma
i26b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
i26b2('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin no// dbus kyang gzhon ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin
i26b3('bum): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dngalus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang / lus kyi
i26b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
i26b5('bum): pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir
i26b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'asngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i26b7('bum): so/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// du yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myong
i26b8('bum): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'as phyi ma'i mthar myi
i27a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus
i27a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
i27a3('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yod kyi 'dus
i27a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong po nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i27a5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
i27a6('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
i27a7('bum): dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa
i27b1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs / dbus myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sgo
i27b2('bum): bo nyid kyang gzhon ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma
i27b3('bum): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang
i27b4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshur ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang
i27b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ ngo bo nyid myed pa'i gang yin pa dang / byang chub
i27b6('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon kyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
i27b7('bum): myed de gnyis su byer myed do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ 
i28a1('bum): bam po / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigaso// sa'i khams
i28a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i28a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams myed pa'i phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i28a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
i28a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so
i28a6('bum): sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams song bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ 
i28a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams myed pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
i28a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sa'i khams myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan
i28b1('bum): ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
i28b2('bum): gzhan ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar nasa'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams po / 
i28b3('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de
i28b4('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
i28b5('bum): myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khas
i28b6('bum): myong po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i28b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
i28b8('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// / chu'i khams dben pa'i phyirabyang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i29a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// chu'i khrims ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams myed pa dang
i29a2('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus su myi dmyigs te/ 
i29a3('bum): chu'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid myed pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
i29a4('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chu'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang
i29a5('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
i29a6('bum): pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mye'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
i29a7('bum): dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar myo dmyigs so// mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur myi dmyig
i29a8('bum): so/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi/ 
i29b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mya dmyigs so// mi'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
i29b2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// me'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i29b3('bum): myi dmyigs so// me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir
i29b4('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu me'i khoms myed pa dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid dang / me'i khams dben pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i29b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ me'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ me'i
i29b6('bum): khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ 
i29b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ me'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / me'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo
i29b8('bum): nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
i30a1('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams myeng ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i30a2('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i30a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
i30a4('bum): dmyigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rlung
i30a5('bum): kyi khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i30a6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams
i30a7('bum): myed pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyig te
i30a8('bum): rlung gi khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// rlung gi khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma
i30b1('bum): yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtho'i 'dra gzhan ma yin D+ha phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa/ 
i30b2('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na rlung gi khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa
i30b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su
i30b4('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stob pa nyid kyi phyir bya
i30b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i30b6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams smong pa nyid phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i/ 
i30b7('bum): mthar myi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i30b8('bum): myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams myong pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ 
i31a1('bum): nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
i31a2('bum): phyir zhe ne/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i dben pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed
i31a3('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nam mkha'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 
i31a4('bum): nam mkha'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
i31a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nam mkha'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang
i31a6('bum): yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i31a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i31a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben po'i phyir/ 
i31b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
i31b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khamaso stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i dben
i31b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
i31b4('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben
i31b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
i31b6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myong / 
i31b7('bum): pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang
i31b8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'angadi gzhan ma yin no/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ong gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i32a1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
i32a2('bum): ba gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang
i32a3('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shAr
i32a4('bum): dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir
i32a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub se mas dpa'
i32a6('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ma rig po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i32a7('bum): ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i32a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i32b1('bum): myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa myed pa dang po/ ma rig ste stong pa nyid kyi dang shA ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mdzan
i32b2('bum): myi dmyigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus kyang myi dmyigs te// ma rig pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa 'ang
i32b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
i32b4('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa rje dang / ma
i32b5('bum): rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gaN+DI
i32b6('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i32b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i32b8('bum): so// 'du byed myeng ba'i phyir byabyang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong po nyid kyi phyir sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i33a1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i33a2('bum): mi dmyigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyi myed pa'i phyir
i33a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha'/ 
i33a4('bum): myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// 'du byed dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin
i33a5('bum): 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan/ 
i33a6('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
i33a7('bum): dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes
i33a8('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang / 
i33b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i33b2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i33b3('bum): so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong
i33b4('bum): pi nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i33b5('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa
i33b6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs// phyi mi'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa 'ang myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
i33b7('bum): yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ong gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
i33b8('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par
i34a1('bum): shes nyi dgrang sbyin dang / ma pa gas pa rlo byung dang/ na / kyi gang yon du nga / ma gang sbyin pa dang / dbus sa
i34a2('bum): tu gnas su myed pa sa mye do// rlung cu shi m+bu'i rgyags myed du byed byung chub sa sa nga smon lan myi dmyigs so// skyed dang ga rnams
i34a3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs te bo nyid med pa'i phyir
i34a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa
i34a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i34a6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// ming dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ 
i34a7('bum): mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i34a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / ming dang gzugs dben po dang / mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyig
i34b1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin// mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i34b2('bum): mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ ston gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
