i34b3('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mying dang gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
i34b4('bum): mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
i34b5('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i34b6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug dben po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i34b7('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug myed pa'o phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i34b8('bum): skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems/ dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigaso// skye mched drug myed
i35a1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i
i35a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shar
i35a3('bum): dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug myed pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te
i35a4('bum): skye mched drug myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// skye mched drug dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i35a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skye
i35a6('bum): mched drug myed pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
i35a7('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthang gang yin pa dang // dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyisu byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
i35a8('bum): bu reg myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg pa stong pa nyid cad kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang
i35b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i35b2('bum): myi dmyigs so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg pa ngo bo nyid
i35b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// reg pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i35b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir/ 
i35b5('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa myed pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid dang / reg pa dben pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyis
i35b6('bum): te/ reg pa 'dra gzhan ma yin reg stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa 'ang gzhin ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi ma
i35b7('bum): 'di gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg
i35b8('bum): ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus yin pa de thas
i36a1('bum): cad kyang / nyis su myo nga gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kye mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i36a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
i36a3('bum): myi dmyigs so// tshe ga mye pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ 
i36a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig
i36a5('bum): sotshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i36a6('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba med pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor po dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma
i36a7('bum): tha myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ tsher ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
i36a8('bum): sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa/ 
i36b1('bum): dang / tsher ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang // tsher ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshe re ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpe' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang // phyi ma'i mthalag
i36b2('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sreng ba
i36b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i36b4('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa dben pa'i
i36b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i36b6('bum): su myi dmyigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
i36b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / srod pa stong pa nyid dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid myed/ 
i36b8('bum): ma la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ srid pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa dben pa 'ang
i37a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'o gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dngus
i37a2('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sred pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sred pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin
i37a3('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan
i37a4('bum): be sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir
i37a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i37a6('bum): myi dmyigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med
i37a7('bum): po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// lon pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
i37a8('bum): dmyigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ya dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir/ 
i37b1('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa myed pa dang / lon bya stong pa nyid dang // len pa dben du dang / len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigaso/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs// dbus
i37b2('bum): myi dmyigs te/ len pa myed pa 'ang gzhan mo yin/ len pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ len pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin// len pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
i37b3('bum): 'od gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na// len pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
i37b4('bum): len pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / len pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' ga
i37b5('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i bu sred pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i37b6('bum): srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chu
i37b7('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ 
i37b8('bum): srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar myi dmyigs so// srid pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs/ 
i38a1('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang ste chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
i38a2('bum): migs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa myed pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid dang
i38a3('bum): srid pa dben pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ srid pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa stong pa nyid kyang
i38a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ srid pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i38a5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ srid pa myed pa gang yin pa dang // srid pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / srid pa dben pa gang yin
i38a6('bum): pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
i38a7('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i38a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha
i38b1('bum): dmyi gas so// skye ba myong po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so / skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthur myi dmyigs so// skye ba
i38b2('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// skye ba myed pa'i phyir/ 
i38b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
i38b4('bum): so// skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba myed pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / skye ba dben pa dang / skye
i38b5('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba dben pa
i38b6('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin// skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ong gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
i38b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ni skye ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang
i38b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin na ba de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyi su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa
i39a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs sushi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngun gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rga shing ngon
i39a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rga shi myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs
i39a3('bum): so rmad ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpo'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rga shi bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i39a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rma shi myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rga shi dben pa
i39a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa'o dbus su myi dmyigs so// rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi myed pa dang
i39a6('bum): rma shrI stong pa nyid dang / rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi mi'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rga shi myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i39a7('bum): rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
i39a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rga shi myed pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin
i39b1('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 
i39b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i39b3('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses
i39b4('bum): dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ston pa'i pha rol du tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i39b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang/ 
i39b6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi
i39b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed
i39b8('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa myed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid
i40a1('bum): dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
i40a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin dra ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i
i40a3('bum): pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhon ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
i40a4('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa dben
i40a5('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
i40a6('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i40a7('bum): so/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
i40a8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ 
i40b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
i40b2('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong po nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha
i40b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// tshul khrims/ 
i40b4('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dbus su myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i40b5('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi
i40b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
i40b7('bum): phyin pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
i40b8('bum): phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// 
i41a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
i41a2('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha
i41a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i41a4('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i41a5('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i41a6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa dben
i41a7('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
i41a8('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
i41b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe
i41b2('bum): lhan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i
i41b3('bum): tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtho'i myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin
i41b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'dra gzhan ma yin
i41b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
i41b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha ro khrid tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol rgyud tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
i41b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gong yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dpe / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
i41b8('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
i42a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rald tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir byang
i42a2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha re lung
i42a3('bum): tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i42a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i42a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
i42a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
i42a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
i42a8('bum): tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/ dbus mi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi
i42b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub seMs
i42b2('bum): dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin te/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
i42b3('bum): tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
i42b4('bum): tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
i42b5('bum): byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i42b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid
i42b7('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
i42b8('bum): tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam
i43a1('bum): gta kyapar yang du phyin pang ba nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i43a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// byasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'a'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
i43a3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam
i43a4('bum): gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la
i43a5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gi pha ro lang tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang
i43a6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'a'ang gzhan ma yin
i43a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa gang yin
i43a8('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsnam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang
i43b1('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtho'i grong yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myong ngo gnyis su byar mad de// tshe dang ldan
i43b2('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
i43b3('bum): dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha
i43b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i43b5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i43b6('bum): dpa'i phyi mi'i mthar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i43b7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dbus su myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
i43b8('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi
i44a1('bum): rold tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
i44a2('bum): tu phyind pa dngan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa de ba nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phye mo'i mtha' skye dmyags/ dbus mya dmyags te// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
i44a3('bum): myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa po
i44a4('bum): bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe
i44a5('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben
i44a6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa grong yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i44a7('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// / bam po'o// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid
i44a8('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems da'i sor kyi ma dmigs so/ ni nga song nyid kyi phyir byang chu sems dpa' sngon gyi mapar myi dmyigs so// nang sang nga nyid pa'i
i44b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i44b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i
i44b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpo'i dbus su myi dmyigs so/ 
i44b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ 
i44b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang // nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong
i44b6('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
i44b7('bum): yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i44b8('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang srong
i45a1('bum): nyid dben pa' gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gung yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
i45a2('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// phyi stong
i45a3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
i45a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i45a5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i45a6('bum): myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid
i45a7('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i45a8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi
i45b1('bum): myi dmyigs de/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma
i45b2('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
i45b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
i45b4('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' glang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i
i45b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub seMs
i45b6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi/ 
i45b7('bum): dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong po nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang
i45b8('bum): stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid da pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa
i46a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ kye phyi nang steng ga nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya
i46a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i46a3('bum): myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi nang stong po nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
i46a4('bum): po la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong daglu zhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
i46a5('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ 
i46a6('bum): no tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid so/ nga pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong
i46a7('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
i46a8('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa
i46b1('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
i46b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myang ba'i phyir byeng/ chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong
i46b3('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa
i46b4('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong
i46b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
i46b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
i46b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / stong phyi nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa
i46b8('bum): nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gozhon ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa
i47a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
i47a2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gi
i47a3('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid
i47a4('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i47a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myeng ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma
i47a6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i47a7('bum): chen po srid pa cing med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbyas su myi dmyigs so// cheni ba stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' bus su myo myigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyi
i47a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// chen po snying po nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa
i47b1('bum): nyid myed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chen po stong ba nyid ngo bo nyid myong ba la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
i47b2('bum): te/ chen po stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa 'dagranan ma yin
i47b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid
i47b4('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin/ 
i47b5('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don pa stong pa nyid
i47b6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
i47b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i47b8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i48a1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir bya
i48a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
i48a3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid
i48a4('bum): myed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
i48a5('bum): te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
i48a6('bum): myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar
i48a7('bum): dwa ti'i bu de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
i48a8('bum): myed pa mang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga badzin pa dang / sngon gyimatha'agab yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad ca gnyis su myed des
i48b1('bum): su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthor myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang na
i48b2('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
i48b3('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtho myi
i48b4('bum): dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig
i48b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben
i48b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tiH
i48b7('bum): bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i48b8('bum): myi dmyigasadabus myi dmyigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang
i49a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 'i mtha'o
i49a2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas
i49a3('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i49a4('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
i49a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon mthar mi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs sa/ 'dus ma
i49a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma ngas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas snong
i49a7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
i49a8('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang nub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid song
i49b1('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i49b2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
i49b3('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i pha dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan/ 
i49b4('bum): ma yin/ 'dus ma byas pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa 'ong gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin// byang chub
i49b5('bum): sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong
i49b6('bum): pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
i49b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad gnyi
i49b8('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa
i50a1('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'a kyi
i50a2('bum): pastong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
i50a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong
i50a4('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
i50a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo/ 
i50a6('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myo dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtho' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
i50a7('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' las 'das
i50a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
i50b1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// 
i50b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa
i50b3('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon kyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thos/ 
i50b4('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha
i50b5('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thog mo dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i50b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar/ 
i50b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'o phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i50b8('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed dang/ 
i51a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tham
i51a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe
i51a3('bum): nasatshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma
i51a4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbus myi dmyigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang
i51a5('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa 'ang gzhon ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang/ 
i51a6('bum): chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi me'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na thog ma dang tham
i51a7('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa s+ho/ 
i51a8('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
i51b1('bum): su myid de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myodang pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya
i51b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir bya
i51b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i51b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
i51b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
i51b6('bum): dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// der ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
i51b7('bum): so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba myed po stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed
i51b8('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
i52a1('bum): yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de ba nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
i52a2('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa
i52a3('bum): gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang
i52a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
i52a5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i52a6('bum): so pa rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhi
i52a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
i52a8('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
i52b1('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub seMs/ 
i52b2('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang / rang bzhin
i52b3('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon kyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
i52b4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhi
i52b5('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
i52b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
i52b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
i52b8('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi
i53a1('bum): mthar mi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang
i53a2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i53a3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ 
i53a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang
i53a5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
i53a6('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi
i53a7('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin
i53a8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma
i53b1('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan mo yin no// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa
i53b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
i53b3('bum): kyekyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myang
i53b4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs so// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
i53b5('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa
i53b6('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben
i53b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
i54a1('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na
i54a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed
i54a3('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa
i54a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid dben pa'ang gzhan mo yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed po'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma
i54a5('bum): yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'dra gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid med pa ga
i54a6('bum): yin pa dang / rta byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gong srin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis
i54a7('bum): su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
i54a8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
i54b1('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs stong pa nyid
i54b2('bum): bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong / 
i54b3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong
i54b4('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// myi dmyigs pa spyod pa nyid med kha'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su/ myi dmyigs so// 
i54b5('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpo' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
i54b6('bum): sbyis m+b+hi myigs pa sa pa skyed pa'i byor byong chub sems dpa dbus su mi myigs so/ rje byo na/ tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu sgo dmyigs spong pa nyid myang ba dang / 
i54b7('bum): du kyi // skyed rtsigs ga mung pa brnyan men gas paso nyi gas yin
i55a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi
i55a2('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
i55a3('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong po nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang
i55a4('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi mo'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa
i55a5('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos
i55a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' srin gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myang de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
i55a7('bum): drangos po myed pa stong pa nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig
i55a8('bum): so sa dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
i55b1('bum): myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sa dbus
i55b2('bum): su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i55b3('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong
i55b4('bum): pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa
i55b5('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan mu yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang
i55b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'du gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
i55b7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po med pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa
i55b8('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
i56a1('bum): nga yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
i56a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i56a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthor myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
i56a4('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthor myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byeng/ 
i56a5('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
i56a6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i56a7('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong
i56a8('bum): ba nyid myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
i56b1('bum): myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
i56b2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ 
i56b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo da
i56b4('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang // sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
i56b5('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so
i56b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthor myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa
i56b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
i56b8('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ 
i57a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i phyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i57a2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
i57a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
i57a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos
i57a5('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon kyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma
i57a6('bum): mtho' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 
i57a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhon ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'a'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
i57a8('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ dngos po myed pa'i bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i
i57b1('bum): po nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
i57b2('bum): myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis
i57b3('bum): su byar myed do// / bam po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
i57b4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi
i57b5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtho
i57b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i57b7('bum): so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dran
i57b8('bum): ba nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar bzhig
i58a1('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa myed pa dang / dran pa nye bar 'o
