i58a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yi na myi dmyigs te
i58a3('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo
i58a4('bum): nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan mo yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
i58a5('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ dran po nye bar bzhag pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar
i58a6('bum): bzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kya
i58a7('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba stong
i58a8('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid
i58b1('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa
i58b2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba de bo nyid
i58b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid
i58b4('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i58b5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba myed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa
i58b6('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag par spong ba myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par so/ 
i58b7('bum): pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin
i58b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma/ yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yang
i59a1('bum): dag par spong ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid
i59a2('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang // phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis byar
i59a3('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpo' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i59a4('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi
i59a5('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i59a6('bum): so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i59a7('bum): so/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi
i59a8('bum): rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i59b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyig
i59b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ kyi rkang pa myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'ang gzhon ma
i59b3('bum): yin no// rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin na// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
i59b4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa myed po gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa
i59b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
i59b6('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dbu dbang po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po stong
i59b7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i59b8('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyig
i60a1('bum): dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// dbang ba
i60a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// dbang po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
i60a3('bum): su myi dmyigs so// dbang po ngo bo nyid myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po myed pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid dang
i60a4('bum): dbang po dben pa dang / dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dbang po myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po stong ba nyid kyang
i60a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbang po dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'o 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i60a6('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ dbang po myed pa'ang gang yin pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dbang po dben pa gang yin
i60a7('bum): pa dang / dbang po ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gaN+DI
i60a8('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
i60b1('bum): myi dmyigs so// stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi na myigs so / 1stabs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs mye
i60b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so // stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
i60b3('bum): ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs so// stobs stom
i60b4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i60b5('bum): myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs myed pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid dang / stobs dben pa dang / stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon kyi mtha' myi dmyigs
i60b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stobs myed pa'ang gzhon ma yin/ stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stobs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa
i60b7('bum): 'di gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
i60b8('bum): nar stobs myed pa gang yin pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i61a1('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i61a2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir
i61a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon go mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag skyongango bo nyid du phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gi mthar myi dmyigs su/ byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i phyir byang
i61a4('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sa kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i61a5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i61a6('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// byang chub kyi stan lag dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyig
i61a7('bum): so// byang chub kyi yon lag ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yon
i61a8('bum): lag stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyi
i61b1('bum): yan ldog myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzha
i61b2('bum): yin/ byang chub kyi sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// 
i61b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub kyi yin lag myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi
i61b4('bum): yan lag ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
i61b5('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
i61b6('bum): brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i61b7('bum): so// 'phags pa'i lham yon lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phag sa pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sa
i61b8('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lo ma yan lag brgyad pa
i62a1('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags bya'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myong
i62a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i
i62a3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang
i62a4('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid
i62a5('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'phags
i62a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'ang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i62a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lum yan lag po ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
i62a8('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgad pa med pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid gi/ yin pa dang
i62b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi ma
i62b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa'i
i62b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i
i62b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden paldan pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i
i62b5('bum): bden pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i
i62b6('bum): bden pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden
i62b7('bum): ba byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa
i62b8('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
i63a1('bum): dwa ti'i bu phags pa'i bden pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bdun pa stong pa nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi ma
i63a2('bum): dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin
i63a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
i63a4('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sho ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa gang yin
i63a5('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i badren pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
i63a6('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan stong pa nyid
i63a7('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i63a8('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyig
i63b1('bum): so/ bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan
i63b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i63b3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan myed pa dang / bsam gtan
i63b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan dben pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus su myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gyi myed pa 'ang gzhan
i63b5('bum): ma yin/ bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin
i63b6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ bsam gtan myong bu gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa
i63b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myong ba gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
i63b8('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyis
i64a1('bum): tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i64a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad pu stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i64a3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i64a4('bum): so// tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa dben pa'i
i64a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshang
i64a6('bum): myeng pa dang / tshad myed pa stong pa nyid dang / tshad myed pa dben pa dang / tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs smram+bu tshad myed pa'ang myed pa yang gzhan
i64a7('bum): ma yin/ tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'i 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
i64a8('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chad med pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
i64a9('bum): dang myed pa ngo bo nyid myong ba 'ang gzhan ma yin
i64b1('bum): tshad myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i64b2('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
i64b3('bum): myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ 
i64b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ji bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyig so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed
i64b5('bum): bu'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs
i64b6('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpal
i64b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub se sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid
i64b8('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigaso// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
i65a1('bum): ngo bo nyid myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa dang / gzu
i65a2('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
i65a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa 'ang gzhan mo yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
i65a4('bum): yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang
i65a5('bum): gzhon ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
i65a6('bum): par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i
i65a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' grang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
i65a8('bum): kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
i65b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir bya
i65b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa
i65b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha dad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i65b4('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// 
i65b5('bum): rnam par thard pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i' dbus su myi dmyigs so che/ rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i65b6('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
i65b7('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par tha rad pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par
i65b8('bum): tha ra pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// 
i66a1('bum): tshe dang // ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu da ltar na/ rnam par tha rad pa myed pa dang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa dben pa gang yin pa
i66a2('bum): dang / rnam par tha rad pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
i66a3('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
i66a4('bum): myi dmyigs so// mtha rad kyis kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
i66a5('bum): 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngona'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i66a6('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jog pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
i66a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i66a8('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir byang
i66b1('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mthor kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i smos
i66b2('bum): bur 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyig
i66b3('bum): so de ci'i phyir zhe nano/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / mthar kyis gra nI
i66b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs pa/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mthar
i66b5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mtha red kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
i66b6('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i66b7('bum): ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas
i66b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mtha nad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
i67a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed do
i67a2('bum): su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par tha red pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mi myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so
i67a3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong po nyid dang
i67a4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid
i67a5('bum): myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
i67a6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa
i67a7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed par
i67a8('bum): smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar thache ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub
i67b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam/ 
i67b2('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
i67b3('bum): smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
i67b4('bum): smon pa med pa dben pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang // smin sted gang pa nyid nga / rnaM sa ste stong nyid dang metshan ma skyed pa dag slong myed pa de 'ang sa rna pa da de slo pa di dang mtsha mi byed par dgi yon
i67b5('bum): myong me nga ga gas phyig sa kyi sengs masas ma bye sa byed slob cing 'an sangs pa tu smras pa nga na bye 'byod lu tu da ga byi bya rnams sa sa
i67b6('bum): ldan pa nyid dang // mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzha
i67b7('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myod pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i
i67b8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa gang yin pa
i68a1('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang // sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
i68a2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' som
i68a3('bum): gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
i68a4('bum): dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so
i68a5('bum): mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par
i68a6('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa stong
i68a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ 
i68a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben/ 
i68b1('bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes
i68b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
i68b3('bum): gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ mngon par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / mngon
i68b4('bum): bar shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa'ang gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang shi/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon
i68b5('bum): kyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir
i68b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems pa
i68b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin/ ngo bo nyid phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gir mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin myed dpa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i68b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin stong nyid myed kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs sa so// ting nge 'dzin mer ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi nas su myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin song
i69a1('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa
i69a2('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i69a3('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzini ngo bo nyid
i69a4('bum): myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin
i69a5('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhon ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin
i69a6('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge/ 
i69a7('bum): 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su
i69a8('bum): myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i69b1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sku dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
i69b2('bum): dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi
i69b3('bum): sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo myong ba'i phyir byang chub
i69b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ 
i69b5('bum): gzungs kyi skye ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid dang
i69b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sde ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtho'i myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs
i69b7('bum): kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
i69b8('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo srod pa
i70a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
i70a2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sdom
i70a3('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub ses
i70a4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir byang
i70a5('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben
i70a6('bum): po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa
i70a7('bum): stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
i70a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa lnga
i70a9('bum): zhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub ses dpa' rab du mi dmyigasad bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyi byang chub sos dpa' dbus su mi dmyig so// 
i70b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
i70b2('bum): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myodang pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha'
i70b3('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
i70b4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
i70b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gling yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi
i70b6('bum): 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i
i70b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i70b8('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i71a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa myedadapa'i phyir ra byang chub
i71a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i71a3('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myi 'jigs pa myed pa
i71a4('bum): dang myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / myi 'jigs pa dben pa dang / myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon kyi mtha' myi dmyigaso// dpung myi phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
i71a5('bum): te myi 'jigs pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan
i71a6('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i71a7('bum): ltar na/ myi 'jigs pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / 
i71a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon khyim tha gang yin pa dang / phyi ma chim pa gang yin po dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ 
i71b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
i71b2('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i71b3('bum): dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub seMs
i71b4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub ses/ 
i71b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
i71b6('bum): dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
i71b7('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i
i71b8('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin
i72a1('bum): yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang drag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin
i72a2('bum): sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ se so yang dag
i72a3('bum): rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / so so yang dgra par rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
i72a4('bum): so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang // sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
i72a5('bum): cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i72a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i72a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma
i72a8('bum): myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i72b1('bum): snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub
i72b2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po myed pa
i72b3('bum): dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dben pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo nyid myed pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon kyi myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus mi
i72b4('bum): dmyigs te de/ snying rje chen po myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po dben pa'ang gzhan mi yin/ snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin
i72b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan mA yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
i72b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi mo'i mtha' 'ang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha/ snying rje chen po myed pa gang yin
i72b7('bum): pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang
i72b8('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas
i73a1('bum): ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
i73a2('bum): so/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' snga
i73a3('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
i73a4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed
i73a5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
i73a6('bum): ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
i73a7('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
i73a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mje' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyig
i73b1('bum): te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i73b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kya
i73b3('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar nu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi/ 
i73b4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
i73b5('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i73b6('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
i73b7('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
i73b8('bum): dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i74a1('bum): ches kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i / mthar myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs sa
i74a2('bum): kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// tshechos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i74a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi dbyings myed pa dang // chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / chos kyi
i74a4('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigasate/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 
i74a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i74a6('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos
i74a7('bum): kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang
i74a8('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
i74b1('bum): so// de bzhin nyid stong po nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthur myi dmyigs so/ de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid
i74b2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon kyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ de bzhin nyid myed pa'i kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi
i74b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid de bo nyid myeng pa'i phyir byang chub
i74b4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
i74b5('bum): myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmyigs so// de
i74b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid myed pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
i74b7('bum): ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid
i74b8('bum): bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ 
i75a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar nu// de bzhin nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
i75a2('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis/ 
i75a3('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha'
i75a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha'
i75a5('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha'
i75a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha'
i75a7('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa mtha' stsa
i75a8('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid meng
i75b1('bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA re dwa ti'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa dang / ma yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag
i75b2('bum): bya'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'ang gzhan ma
i75b3('bum): yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtho' dben pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
i75b4('bum): 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa
i75b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mthu'i ngo bo nyid myed pa grang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
i75b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang // dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ga
i75b7('bum): yang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
i75b8('bum): myi dmyigs so// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems pa
i76a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid
i76a2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
i76a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid
i76a4('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngobo/ 
i76a5('bum): nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i
i76a6('bum): dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
i76a7('bum): myi dmyigs te/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa 'ang gzham
i76a8('bum): ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i76b1('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis
i76b2('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi
i76b3('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myod de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' stsa
i76b4('bum): kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos
i76b5('bum): ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sem
i76b6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos dben po'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid myong ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
i76b7('bum): dmyigs so// nyan thos myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir
i76b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus myi dmyigs so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos
i77a1('bum): pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 
i77a2('bum): thos myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang gzhan
i77a3('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ nyan thos myed pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos
i77a4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
i77a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
i77a6('bum): mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyig so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i77a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong
i77a8('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed
i77b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyis kyi mthar myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub smos/ 
i77b2('bum): dpa'o dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
i77b3('bum): dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas myed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid mya
i77b4('bum): ba la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi nya me'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ra sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin sgra ra/ 
i77b5('bum): sangs rgyas dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin// / byang chub sems dpa'a'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma
i77b6('bum): mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rang sangs rgyas med pa 'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
i77b7('bum): sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi
i77b8('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bya
i78a1('bum): chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma
i78a2('bum): so/ byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dam
i78a3('bum): so byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ 
i78a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
i78a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub seMs
i78a6('bum): dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang / 
i78a7('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi
i78a8('bum): mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin
i78b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa 'ang gzhon ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'ong gzhan ma yin te sngon gyi mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ 
i78b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid
i78b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems te dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
i78b4('bum): dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa'i
i78b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa
i78b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi myigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmyigs so// / thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa'i
i78b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyi
i78b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ thams cing mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa med pa'i
i79a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa
i79a2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
i79a3('bum): dbus su myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa
i79a4('bum): myed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi mi'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
i79a5('bum): myi dmyigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa
i79a6('bum): ji bo nyid med pa'ing gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'a'ang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' 'dugazhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' 'ang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
i79a7('bum): ra d+ha ti'i bri de ltar na// thams cad kyi khyen pa myed pa gang min pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa song pa ting gAng na pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa pa gang min pa dang / thams cad pakhyen
i79b1('bum): gnyis su par myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar myi dmyigs so// 
i79b2('bum): chub sems dpa' dang 'a dbus su myi dmyigs so// bam po'o// / tshongad nga ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun du maH
i79b3('bum): yos pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa 'gron tu mtha' u par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ che dang ldan pa sha na dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam paste/ de tse'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan
i79b4('bum): bu sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha
i79b5('bum): zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub gzugs kyi ston gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyig
i79b6('bum): tertsa stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas pa/ 
i79b7('bum): rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tsho ru ba
i79b8('bum): ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mthu
i80a1('bum): yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes myang du brjod de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshor ba ston gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mying rgyas
i80a2('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ma
i80a3('bum): yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas par phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
i80a4('bum): bu 'du shes ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigaso/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas
i80a5('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs
i80a6('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyig so/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha
i80a7('bum): yas por rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du byed kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya nas zer ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
i80a8('bum): bu 'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 
i80b1('bum): nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// dbus myi dmyigs
i80b2('bum): te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grang sa des na 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
i80b3('bum): par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
i80b4('bum): dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmigs
i80b5('bum): te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi
i80b6('bum): dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha'
i80b7('bum): yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ba myig kun tu mthe yis pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
i80b8('bum): bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
i81a1('bum): dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ pas nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du myig stong pa nyid kyi
i81a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gyi dmyigs/ phyi mi'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sang pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i thun mo grangs des na/ ma
i81a3('bum): tu mthu' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na// rno ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
i81a4('bum): par rig par bya zhes bor ba ni/ che dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bran pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam bste/ de ci'i phyir no na/ 'di gar dpe na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha
i81a5('bum): dmyigs/ dbus mye myigs te/ mnal mas kun tamatha' mas pa'i phyi rnam mal shes maung 'arjod do// rje na bkar d+ha'i bzhin dun 'aslong po ting ba sngon gyi
i81a6('bum): mas/ ma rol kyi kyigs/ dngas rgyags/ su rgyas kyi rmyig po// ma lta rnam tha na du
i81a7('bum): chu ses ma la sa pa jog pa / d+ha ba ma la sa pa kyi ba su'i ma gas
i81b1('bum): dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
i81b2('bum): dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te// stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha
i81b3('bum): sa par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpo' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce ni nam mkha'
i81b4('bum): dod mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs ni/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha'
i81b5('bum): zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus
i81b6('bum): myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lus
i81b7('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
i81b8('bum): dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmigs teng // mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod
i82a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/ dbus mi dmyimigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi
i82a2('bum): so// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lus kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun to/ mtha' yas pa'i phyira'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' smras pa
i82a3('bum): par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ yid kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid ni
i82a4('bum): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha
i82a5('bum): yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du yang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs// phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs
