i106a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
i106a7('bum): dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas pa'i rig par bya'o// gang yang
i106a8('bum): 'di skad du ci'i phyir na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs
i106b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs te/ dbus myi
i106b2('bum): dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
i106b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'i 'am dbus myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
i106b4('bum): grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du
i106b5('bum): ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ tsherab byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du shes byang
i106b6('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
i106b7('bum): ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs zhes zer da ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myed/ byang chub sems dpa'
i106b8('bum): myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs ni gzugs kyis stod ste/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe
i107a1('bum): bas stong sde/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshor ba myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba byang chub se
i107a2('bum): zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du shes myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myod do/ tshe dang ldan
i107a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du byas
i107a4('bum): myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ni
i107a5('bum): rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa byang chub
i107a6('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i107a7('bum): stong pa nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong sdes/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong
i107a8('bum): ba nyid la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myang ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ stong pa nyid
i107b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la brtson
i107b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la/ 
i107b3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas skyong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la shes ra/ 
i107b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang spong ba nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid lha nang stong pa nyid
i107b5('bum): myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang
i107b6('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid
i107b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa'
i107b8('bum): myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa/ pa byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 'dus byas slong pa nyid
i108a1('bum): ni 'dus byas snga nyid sa snang ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus kyi byas
i108a2('bum): spang ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis steng stsog de ci'i
i108a3('bum): na/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa
i108a4('bum): theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mang byang chub sems dpa' myong do// dor ba myong ba song panyid ni dor ba myong ba stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong btong ma dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid byed du
i108a5('bum): chub sems dpa' med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis slong ste// de ci'i phyir nom/ stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myeng byang chub sems dpa' byed do// chos thams cad su
i108a6('bum): banyid na rgyas thams cad stong pa nyid kyis spangaste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos bams cing stong pa nyid myed bung chub sems dab byed do// rang gi maran nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid ba
i108a7('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ slong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir na
i108a8('bum): ma stong pa nyid la myi dmigs pa spong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' med do// dngos po med pa spong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir na no/ sreng pa nyid la dngos so
i108b1('bum): stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' myed do// dngos po
i108b2('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stod kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
i108b3('bum): bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pas spong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// yang dag par spong ba
i108b4('bum): rnams ni yang dag par rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par spong ba rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong
i108b5('bum): de sa'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med byang chub sems dpa skyed do// dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis skyong sa / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ song po nyid la dbang po rnams myed bya
i108b6('bum): chub sems dpa' myed do// stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stobs rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub
i108b7('bum): yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam ya
i108b8('bum): brgyad pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
i109a1('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de tsa
i109a2('bum): nastong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshad myed pa rnams myed byang chub sem
i109a3('bum): dpa' myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
i109a4('bum): pa ma rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa brgyad myed byang chub sems dpa' myed
i109a5('bum): do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar kyis gnas par 'jug pa dgus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med bya
i109a6('bum): chub sems dpa' myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa ni mtshan ma myed rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas stong
i109a7('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myong / byang chub sems dpa' myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa/ 
i109a8('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mngon par shes pa rnams myong/ byang chub sems dpa' med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen
i109b1('bum): stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin rnams myeng byang chub sems dpa' myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed byang
i109b2('bum): chub sems dpa' myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rna'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed
i109b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do// mi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis song ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la myi 'jigs pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa'i myed de/ so
i109b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la so so yang dag par rig par rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// snying rje chen po ni
i109b5('bum): snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la snying rje chen po myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sto
i109b6('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
i109b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// yang dag
i109b8('bum): ma nasu sa na kyang ma 'dos gyi / sa kyis kyi rgya gyi na
i110a1('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myong byang chub sems dpa' myed do// thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid
i110a2('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis steng
i110a3('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste
i110a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan
i110a5('bum): thos kyi theg pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste kade ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas myed/ byang chub sems dpa'
i110a6('bum): myed do// sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do// nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
i110a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos med/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas myed / byang chub sas
i110a8('bum): dpa' myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
i110b1('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshor po byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du shes byang chub
i110b2('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu
i110b3('bum): yang myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad ma dmyigs na/ byang chub
i110b4('bum): sems dpa' gang zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad smras zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni
i110b5('bum): gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshor ba ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang / 
i110b6('bum): tshor ba ni 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du shes 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes
i110b7('bum): ni 'du byed rnams la med cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs
i110b8('bum): dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa ni gzugs pa
i111a1('bum): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni myig la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig ni rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs
i111a2('bum): ni rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba ni myig la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig dang rna ba ni sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so// snga ni sA la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna ni sna la myed cing myi dmyigs
i111a3('bum): sna ni myig dang rna ba la med cing myi dmyigs so// myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce ni lce la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce ni myig dang rna ba dang sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig
i111a4('bum): dang rna ba dang sna dang lce ni lus la myed cing myi dmyigs so / lus ni lus la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus ni myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus na
i111a5('bum): yid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid ni yid la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid ni myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs
i111a6('bum): ni sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sgra ni sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sgra ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang sgra ni dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so// dri ni dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 
i111a7('bum): dri ni gzugs dang sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang dri dang ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so// ro na ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so// ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la myed cing myi dmyigs
i111a8('bum): gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la myed cing myi dmyigs so// reg ni reg la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rig ni gzugs ni dang sgra dang dri dang ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gzugs dang sgra dang dri
i111b1('bum): dang ro dang reg bya ni chos la myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos ni chos la myed cing myi dmyigs so// chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni
i111b2('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed
i111b3('bum): cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed ci
i111b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes bya ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs
i111b5('bum): so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa
i111b6('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam por shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par / 
i111b7('bum): ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par
i111b8('bum): shes pa la myod cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa na myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing
i112a1('bum): dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam pa
i112a2('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par
i112a3('bum): dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// 
i112a4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg
i112a5('bum): pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing myi dmyigs so/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi da ma
i112a6('bum): so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni mig go 'dus te rig pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'phru
i112a7('bum): te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs
i112a8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyi
i112b1('bum): so myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
i112b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed
i112b3('bum): cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing
i112b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
i112b5('bum): pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi
i112b6('bum): dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus
i112b7('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus
i112b8('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe
i113a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus
i113a2('bum): ba las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
i113a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yulce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lce'i
i113a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ 
i113a5('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
i113a6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
i113a7('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las bung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus
i113a8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yi med cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las/ 
i113b1('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung bu dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las drung ba dang // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byeng bya dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las dru
i113b2('bum): bye dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg
i113b3('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las thung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung bya dang lce'i 'dus te reg
i113b4('bum): las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// / bam po / sa'i khams ni sa'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams
i113b5('bum): ni chu'i khams la myong cing myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ni chu'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams dang chu'i khams ni mye'i khams
i113b6('bum): la myed cing myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams ni mye'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// mye'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / mu'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang / me'i
i113b7('bum): ni rlung gi khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams ni sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dpa/ me'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so//

i124b7('bum): myi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas la myed cing myi dmyigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lhan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
i124b8('bum): sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa la med cing myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang
i125a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'o ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub
i125a2('bum): dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myod cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la
i125a3('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa' dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes
i125a4('bum): su bstan pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so// gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la myed cing dmyigs so// das su ldan tu chu ses pa las da khyon pa rjes ma kyi tshe dang ldan pa
i125a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar chos thams cad myed cing dmyigs su myed pas byang chub sems dpa' myed cing myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyar na/ 'di lta ste/ bye
i125a6('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam yin no zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni glo 'ur du mying du btags pa ste/ de ci'i phyir na
i125a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed
i125a8('bum): ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du gdags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni
i125b1('bum): gzugs ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de ni 'du shes ma yin/ de ni 'du byed ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 
i125b2('bum): stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes
i125b3('bum): bya ba dang / sA zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya ba dang / lus shes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba 'di ni blo 'ur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro gang na yang mi
i125b4('bum): gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin/ de ni rna ba ma yin/ de ni sna ma yin/ de ni lce ma yin/ de ni lus ma yin/ de ni yid ma yin no// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying
i125b5('bum): gri rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs
i125b6('bum): shes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / re zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / chos shes bya ba 'di ni glo'ur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang
i125b7('bum): myi 'gro gang ni yang myi gnas so/ mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ de ni sgra ma yin/ de ni dri ma yin/ de ni ro ma yin de ni reg ma yin/ de ni chos ma yin no// de ci'i
i125b8('bum): phyir zhe nasa'adi ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang
i126a1('bum): sa ra dwa ti'i du 'di sa / myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
i126a2('bum): byab dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gle'ur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ang gang du yang myi 'gre gapan
i126a3('bum): myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma
i126a4('bum): yin/ de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma
i126a5('bum): yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
i126a6('bum): zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gro 'ur du mying du btab
i126a7('bum): ba ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so// ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin
i126a8('bum): de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin// de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying
i126b1('bum): gyi rang bzhin gyis stong / stong pa gling yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying nyam zhes bya'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste
i126b2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / rna bu'i 'dres te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bye dang / lce'i 'dus te rnag
i126b3('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsho ra ba zhes bya ba 'di ni glo 'ur du btags pa ste// 'di ltar
i126b4('bum): mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro/ gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
i126b5('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin
i126b6('bum): de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste
i126b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste sa'i khams shes bya ba dang // chu'i khams shes bya ba dang // mo'i khams shes bya ba dang / 
i126b8('bum): rung kyi khams shes bya ba dang / nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni gle'ur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni grong nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang gyi
i127a1('bum): ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin de ni chu'i khams ma yin/ de ni me'i khams ma yin de ni rlung gi khams ma yin
i127a2('bum): nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ de na rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ 
i127a3('bum): phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar skye/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang // rnam par shes
i127a4('bum): ba zhes bya ba 'dadang / mying dang gzugs shes bya ba dang / skye mched drug ces bya ba dang / reg pa zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dang // len pa zhes bya ba dang / srid pa
i127a5('bum): zhes bya ba nang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur da mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so// mying tsam zhes bya
i127a6('bum): bya ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin// de ni 'du byed ma yin de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin de ni skye mched drug ma yin// de ni reg ma yin/ 
i127a7('bum): ba ma yin de ni sred pa ma yin/ de ni len pa ma yin/ de ni srid pa ma yin/ de ni skye ba ma yin// de ni rga shi ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhem/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis/ 
i127a8('bum): sdod pa/ gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha
i127b1('bum): ro lang du phyinang pa 'di ni mying tsam ste// ming lnga'ang sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa mye so/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'ang mi'i mying // / de ci'i phyir zhe nas/ 'di ltar myi gang yin pa
i127b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin dra paM gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ 'di lta ste// tshul khrims kyi pha
i127b3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / chus
i127b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te// de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol
i127b5('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'di la
i127b6('bum): mying gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ 
i127b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha re lang du phyin pa 'di ni myi tsam stedamying la 'dra brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mying myed // de ci'i phyi n+da na/ 'di lta
i127b8('bum): mying gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te ka de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo
i128a1('bum): lnga ste/ bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni myang tsam ste/ mIng la'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rolang tu byin bu mong/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'ang myong mya // de ci'i phyirkye
i128a2('bum): 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang myed cing myi dmyibs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo
i128a3('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang myong med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin
i128a4('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka 'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid
i128a5('bum): 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la 'ang nang stong pa nyid med/ nang stong pa nyid la'ang mying med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / nang stong ba nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang myed cing myi dam
i128a6('bum): te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ 'di lta ste/ phyi stong pa nyid ni mying tsam so/ mying la'ang phyi stong pa nyid myed/ phyi stong pa nyid la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i
i128a7('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste phyi
i128a8('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka 'a
i128b1('bum): myang cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying nam mo 'di lta ste stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste ba mying sa 'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed
i128b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub
i128b3('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam stemying la 'ang chen po stong pa nyid myed de/ chen po stong pa nyid la 'ang myeng myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying
i128b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ster/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste don dam pa stong pa nyid 'a ni
i128b5('bum): mying tsam ste/ mying la 'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid myed doni dam pa stong pa nyid la 'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang
i128b6('bum): myeng cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la 'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed/ 'dus byas
i128b7('bum): slong pa nyid la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
i128b8('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la 'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myenga'adus ma byas stong pa nyid la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyi
i129a1('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka 'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni
i129a2('bum): mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ ming la'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mying myed do// de ci'i phyir
i129a3('bum): 'di sar ming gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka 'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di ga ste/ byang chub sems dpo'i zhes bya ba 'don
i129a4('bum): ram mo// ngas pa spong ba nyid/ 'di lta ste/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni myong tsam s+ho// mying la'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid myed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stsong
i129a5('bum): pa nyid la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka 'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te// de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub
i129a6('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la 'ang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la'ang mying myed de/ 
i129a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyi ka'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying / 
i129a8('bum): tsam mo// 'di lta ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa/ 
i129b1('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka 'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad stong
i129b2('bum): pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam sa/ mying la'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / chos
i129b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka 'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
i129b4('bum): nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la 'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na mi 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang // rang gi mtshan nyis
i129b5('bum): slong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka 'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam
i129b6('bum): sme/ mying la 'ang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid grang
i129b7('bum): ston pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing myi dmyigs te de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam
i129b8('bum): mying la 'ang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myeng/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin
i130a1('bum): ba de gnyis ka 'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te / de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste
i130a2('bum): mying la 'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang myed cing myi
i130a3('bum): dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// 'di lta ste dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ mying la 'ang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
i130a4('bum): stong pa nyid myed/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang
i130a5('bum): myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzheg pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni gro
i130a6('bum): bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams myed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lnga mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar
i130a7('bum): gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ ya
i130a8('bum): dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo'ur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la 'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams myed// yang dag par spong ba rnams la'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
i130b1('bum): mying gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// tshe dang ldan pa/ 
i130b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btogs pa ste/ mying la 'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la'ang mying myed de/ 
i130b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying

i130b7('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spongs rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myod cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni myong
i130b8('bum): tsam mo tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed/ 
i131a1('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams la 'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na mo 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing myi dmyigs te
i131a2('bum): de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying
i131a3('bum): du btags pa ste/ mying la 'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang mying myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'phag

i131a6('bum): phyir zhe nam 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/

i131b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la'ang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms por 'jug po rnams myed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyems

i159b1('bum): me'i khams kha na ma tho ba med pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// rlung gi khams kha na ma tho ba myed de ste gang dang bral bas ma yin no// nam mkha' khams kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma
i159b2('bum): yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 'du byed kha na
i159b3('bum): ma thob myed pa ste gang yang bral bas ma yin no// rnam par shes pa kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ mying dang gzugs kha na ma tho bu myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/

i159b7('bum): myong pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa kho na mar tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa khwa na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang

i160a1('bum): bral bas ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba med pa ste gang dang yang

i160a3('bum): myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 
i160a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kha na ma the ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kha na

i160a6('bum): yang bral bas ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no//

i160b1('bum): yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kha na ma tho ba myed pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kha na ma tho bu myed pa ste gang dang /

i171b5('bum): yin no/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste gang dang yang

i172a1('bum): rten las 'das pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste gang dang yang bral bas
i172a2('bum): ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste gang dang yang bral ba sa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/

i172a7('bum): ba dang zad pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang chos

i176a1('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa

i176a3('bum): 'dus reg reg rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci'i de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba rtag pa ma yin te/ de ci'i

i176a7('bum): rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni
i176a8('bum): yin no// chu'i khams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhen do'i rang bzhin ni de yin mo// me'i khams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhon/ ro yang bzhin ni de yin no
i176b1('bum): rlung gi khams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// rgya nam mkha'i khams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no

i176b3('bum): de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// 'du byed rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te de nIl+li/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// rnam par shes pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de

i176b6('bum): sred pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// le nad pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// srid pa rtag pa
i176b7('bum): ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// skye ba rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// rga shi rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa
i176b8('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin/ 
i177a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig
i177a2('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nod pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// bsam
i177a3('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
i177a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ phyi stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin/ 
i177a5('bum): 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin na de yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag
i177a6('bum): ba ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// chen po stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// don dam pa
i177a7('bum): stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// 'dus ma
i177a8('bum): byas stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i ra
i177b1('bum): bzhin ni de yin no/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang gzhin ni de yin no/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma
i177b2('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe ni// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma
i177b3('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
i177b4('bum): rtag pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i ro ba zhin ni de yin no// ngo bo nyid stong
i177b5('bum): pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin/ 
i177b6('bum): ni de yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhi/ ni de yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag pa ma
i177b7('bum): yin 'jig pa me yin te// de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// dbang po
i177b8('bum): rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// stobs rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ 
i178a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig
i178a2('bum): ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhi
i178a3('bum): ni de yin no// bsam gtan rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// tshad myed pa rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
i178a4('bum): zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// rnam par tha rad pa/ 
i178a5('bum): brgyad pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
i178a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de
i178a7('bum): yin no// mngon par shes pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ ting nge 'dzind rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
i178a8('bum): de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// gzungs kyi sgra rnams rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag pa ma yin
i178b1('bum): 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'jog pa bzhi rtag pa mu yin 'jig pa ma yin te// de ci'i rang bzhin/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rtag pa ma yin
i178b2('bum): 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/ byams pa chen po rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// snying rje chen po
i178b3('bum): rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i
i178b4('bum): rang bzhin ni de yin no// dge ba'i chos rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// myi dge ba'i chos rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
i178b5('bum): zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// 'dus ma byas kyi chos rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// 'dus ma byas kyi chos rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa
i178b6('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no// zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma
i178b7('bum): yin 'jig pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i ring bzhin ni de yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa shar
i178b8('bum): dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzugs mngon par ma grub/ ci'i phyir na cher ba mngon par ma grub/ ci'i phyir na 'du shes mngon par ma grub/ de ci'i phyir na 'du byed mngon par ma grub
i179a1('bum): ci'i phyir na rnam par shes pa mngon par ma grub ces smras she zer ba de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar gzugs
i179a2('bum): ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// tshor ba ni mngon par 'dus mi byas pa'o// 'du shes ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'du byed ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// rnam par shes pa na mngon pa
i179a3('bum): 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// tshor ba la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// 'du shes pa la mngon par 'du byed pa med de/ 'du byed la

i179a5('bum): la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do/ rna ba ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// sna ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
i179a6('bum): 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// lce ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// lus ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa s+ho
i179a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar do la mngon par 'du byed pa med do// yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa shar du
i179a8('bum): bu gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// sgra ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du
i179b1('bum): byed pa myod do// dri ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// ro ni mngon par 'du me byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de la mngon par
i179b2('bum): 'du byed pa myed do// reg ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// chos ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de la
i179b3('bum): mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam
i179b4('bum): par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ 
i179b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// lus kyi
i179b6('bum): rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i179b7('bum): 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// 
i179b8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci'i phyir zhe/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ 
i180a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byas pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa

i180a3('bum): mi byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ 
i180a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do/

i180a6('bum): bar 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i180a7('bum): 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa med do/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa
i180a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nga la mngon par 'du byed pa med do// chu'i khams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas po ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa myeng batsha me'i khams
i180a9('bum): 'dus ma byasade ci'i phyir zhen 'di ltar de la mi
